title: Divyamani Temple Haaram with Polki Diamonds
materials: Ruby and Pearl accents. Features traditional Hyderabadi polish for a lustrous finish.
features: A classic 'Temple Haaram' (necklace) featuring a central pendant of Goddess Lakshmi, rendered in intricate repouss√© work. The necklace strand is adorned with alternating floral and teardrop motifs set with shimmering Polki diamonds. Delicate pearl drops add a touch of elegance and movement to each pendant. Handcrafted Nakshi work showcases the divine deity. The setting highlights the brilliance of the polki diamonds.
colors: Predominantly gold with white polki diamonds
complemented by the warm red of ruby accents and the soft luster of the pearls.
occasions: and other special occasions. Perfect for Muhurtham or Seemantham ceremonies.
description: This Temple Haaram is a timeless heirloom piece, reflecting the rich cultural heritage of South India. The use of high-quality Polki diamonds and 22K gold ensures enduring beauty and value. Handcrafted with meticulous attention to detail, this necklace is a symbol of prosperity and divine blessings. The Temple design makes it a truly unique and meaningful piece of jewelry.
